dict.acceptation: 在…之间；私下，暗中；在…中任择其一；来往于…之间；

sent.orig: That means peace between Palestinians and Israelis, between Syria and Israel and between Lebanon and Israel.
sent.trans: 这意味着包括了巴勒斯坦和以色列，叙利亚和以色列，黎巴嫩和以色列之间的和平。

sent.orig: Financial markets(between firms and households, between firms and other firms, and between households and other households).
sent.trans: 金融市场（企业与家庭之间、企业与其它企业之间以及家庭与其它家庭之间）。

sent.orig: The relationship between impact toughness and tempering temperature indicated secondary tempering brit-tleness peak at between 570-580.
sent.trans: 试验确认20MnSi螺纹钢筋的第二类回火脆性产生温度在570～580。

sent.orig: Affection and friendship it is a relationship between groups, also can be a relationship between monomer.
sent.trans: 亲情与友情它是一个群体关系，也可以是一种单体关系。

sent.orig: Adaptation between linguistic structure and context is largely adaptation between language and culture.
sent.trans: 而语言结构和语境之间的顺应，主要就是语言和文化之间的顺应。
